tatsu-lab /

      stanford_alpaca---Code and documentation to train Stanford's Alpaca models, and generate the data.

ggerganov /

      llama.cpp---Port of Facebook's LLaMA model in C/C++

togethercomputer /

      OpenChatKit---

kaixindelele /

      ChatPaper---Use ChatGPT to summarize the arXiv papers.

whoiskatrin /

      sql-translator---SQL Translator is a tool for converting natural language queries into SQL code using artificial intelligence. This project is 100% free and open source.

cogentapps /

      chat-with-gpt---An open-source ChatGPT app with a voice

exaloop /

      codon---A high-performance, zero-overhead, extensible Python compiler using LLVM

comfyanonymous /

      ComfyUI---A powerful and modular stable diffusion GUI with a graph/nodes interface.

base-org /

      node---Everything required to run your own Base node

pynecone-io /

      pynecone---🕸 Web apps in pure Python 🐍

futantan /

      OpenGpt---Create your own ChatGPT App in seconds.

openai /

      openai-cookbook---Examples and guides for using the OpenAI API

ayaka14732 /

      ChatGPTAPIFree---A simple and open-source proxy API that allows you to access OpenAI's ChatGPT API for free!

MasterBin-IIAU /

      UNINEXT---[CVPR'23] Universal Instance Perception as Object Discovery and Retrieval

cocktailpeanut /

      dalai---The simplest way to run LLaMA on your local machine

thu-ml /

      unidiffuser---Code and models for the paper "One Transformer Fits All Distributions in Multi-Modal Diffusion"

xx025 /

      carrot---这儿收集了一些免费好用的ChatGPT镜像站 当前：57个站点

Genymobile /

      scrcpy---Display and control your Android device

upscayl /

      upscayl---🆙 Upscayl - Free and Open Source AI Image Upscaler for Linux, MacOS and Windows built with Linux-First philosophy.

poorjobless /

      pinduoduo_backdoor_code---拼多多事件的脱壳后的部分代码

orhun /

      halp---A CLI tool to get help with CLI tools 🐙

acheong08 /

      EdgeGPT---Reverse engineered API of Microsoft's Bing Chat

Const-me /

      Whisper---High-performance GPGPU inference of OpenAI's Whisper automatic speech recognition (ASR) model

facebookresearch /

      llama---Inference code for LLaMA models
